name: Edtechgarden.GitHub.io
tagline: Growing a sustainable web in education one site at a time.
body:
### Ed Tech Garden

This page's repository will grow to contain the technology education materials for edtechgarden.org. To begin, check out [Reclaiming a personal space for education](./buildweb/), our series of lessons and group activities for building personal web sites originally offered on [P2P University](https://courses.p2pu.org/en/courses/3334/reclaim-a-personal-space-for-education-online/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
